name: Open Up, Grampy!
description:
Details:

Created for the One Map Challenge in the RPG Maker forums

  • Goal:  get grumpy Gramps to open the door for sweet Granny
  • 2-3 minutes of gameplay
  • This is my first completed project - small and cheesy but that's okay!  :)

Play Mechanics:

  • UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT arrows to move character or change selection
  • ENTER or SPACE to select or finish dialog boxes
  • ESC or X for menu
  • This game is not designed for mobile browsers but you can tap what you want to interact with (or to advance dialog boxes);  Menu in upper-right-hand corner

Credits:

  • Game "Open Up, Grampy!" by Quexp
  • Created in RPG Maker MZ; Copyright (C) Gotcha Gotcha Games Inc. / YOJI OJIMA 2020
  • Music "Rustic Ballad" by Alexander Nakarada; Creative Commons BY 4.0
  • Original hands image from Creazilla.com; "Public Domain. Free for personal and commercial use. No attribution required."
  • Hand edits and pie by Quexp
  • Special thanks goes to Caz as I learned how to randomize variables through one of Cookie Cutter templates

Stats:

  • 9 events + 1 common event
  • 4 switches + 6 self switches
  • 1 variable
  • 5 conditional branches
  • 4 items
  • 0 plugins
